data.title: Q3C: A PostgreSQL package for spatial queries and cross-matches of large astronomical catalogs
data.name: q3c
data.description: PostgreSQL extension for spatial indexing on a sphere

evidence: "Author: Sergey Koposov, University of Edinburgh" and repo owner is a single GitHub user (segasai), indicating personal maintenance.

"After the installation you will have several new functions in PostgreSQL. All names of these functions start with the 'q3c_' prefix." â€“ Q3C is a PostgreSQL extension/library providing functions, i.e., used as a dependency.

README describes domain-specific astronomical queries (cone search, cross-match, density estimation) used directly for scientific catalog analysis, e.g. "To begin use Q3C for searches and cross-matches you should create the indexes on your tables."
